meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like paper.
meanings.sent1: The paperiness of the leaves made them look delicate.
meanings.sent2: I love the paperiness of old books.
meanings.sent3: The paperiness of the tissue made it tear easily.
meanings.sent4: Her skin had a paperiness to it, like parchment.
meanings.sent5: The paperiness of the origami crane was impressive.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having the texture or appearance of paper.
meanings.sent1: The paperiness of the fabric made it feel rough.
meanings.sent2: The paperiness of the drawing made it look realistic.
meanings.sent3: The paperiness of the cake made it seem like a giant paper creation.
meanings.sent4: The paperiness of the clouds resembled crumpled sheets.
meanings.sent5: The paperiness of the painting added depth to the artwork.
